query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS workflow_templates (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT NOT NULL,
  category ENUM('welcome', 'course', 'engagement', 'certification', 'reminder', 'nurture') NOT NULL,
  triggerType ENUM('cohort_join', 'date_based', 'manual', 'enrollment', 'completion') NOT NULL,
  triggerConfig JSON,
  workflowData JSON NOT NULL,
  previewImage VARCHAR(500),
  tags JSON,
  usageCount INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  isPublic BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  createdBy INT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS template_usage (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
  templateId INT NOT NULL,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  workflowId INT NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
